<h3 id="X22938">X(22938) = PARALLELOGIC CENTER OF THESE TRIANGLES: EHRMANN-MID TO INNER-GARCIA</h3>
Barycentrics &nbsp;&nbsp; 2*a^7-2*(b+c)*a^6-2*(b-c)^2*a^5+2*(b^3+c^3)*a^4-(2*b^4+2*c^4-(b^2+c^2)*b*c)*a^3+2*(b^3-c^3)*(b^2-c^2)*a^2+(b^2-c^2)^2*(b-2*c)*(2*b-c)*a-2*(b^2-c^2)^3*(b-c)  :  :

<br>
<b>X(22938) = 3*X(4)+X(149) = 5*X(4)-X(153) = 3*X(4)-X(10742) = 3*X(5)-2*X(3035) = X(100)-3*X(381) = 3*X(119)-X(6154) = 5*X(149)+3*X(153) = X(149)-3*X(10738) = 2*X(149)+3*X(22799) = X(153)+5*X(10738) = 3*X(153)-5*X(10742) = 2*X(153)-5*X(22799) = 6*X(546)-X(6154) = 3*X(10738)+X(10742) = 2*X(10738)+X(22799)</b>
<p>
The reciprocal parallelogic center of these triangles is X(1).</p>
<p>X(22938) lies on these lines:
{3,10724}, {4,145}, {5,3035}, {11,30}, {80,5560}, {100,381}, {104,382}, {119,546}, {214,9955}, {355,14217}, {516,12619}, {528,3845}, {548,21154}, {549,6667}, {550,6713}, {946,11567}, {962,19914}, {1145,18357}, {1317,3585}, {1385,16174}, {1387,1388}, {1478,12735}, {1484,2829}, {1539,2771}, {1699,6265}, {1770,20118}, {1836,10073}, {2550,6929}, {2783,22505}, {2787,22515}, {2800,22793}, {2802,18480}, {2806,19163}, {2831,19160}, {3045,10540}, {3091,13199}, {3543,12248}, {3579,6702}, {3656,7972}, {3818,9024}, {3830,10707}, {3839,20095}, {3843,12331}, {3850,10993}, {3857,20400}, {4996,13743}, {5066,6174}, {5533,7354}, {5541,18492}, {5690,10525}, {5691,12737}, {5848,21850}, {5886,12119}, {6033,10769}, {6284,8068}, {6321,10768}, {6734,19919}, {6924,10893}, {7728,10778}, {8148,12531}, {8674,10113}, {9803,10248}, {9812,12247}, {9818,13222}, {10057,12701}, {10058,12953}, {10074,12943}, {10087,10895}, {10090,10896}, {10308,11604}, {10711,14269}, {10739,10772}, {10740,10777}, {10741,10770}, {10747,10771}, {10750,10782}, {10751,10781}, {10755,18440}, {10773,15521}, {10774,15522}, {10780,12918}, {12019,12764}, {12047,12743}, {12611,18483}, {13194,18502}, {13205,18491}, {13228,18495}, {13230,18497}, {13235,18500}, {13268,18507}, {13269,18509}, {13270,18511}, {13271,18516}, {13272,18517}, {13275,18520}, {13276,18522}, {13278,18542}, {13279,18544}, {13665,19113}, {13785,19112}, {13922,18538}, {13991,18762}, {16173,18481}, {18240,18527}, {18761,22560}</p>
<p>
X(22938) = midpoint of X(i) and X(j) for these {i,j}: {3, 10724}, {4, 10738}, {80, 12699}, {104, 382}, {355, 14217}, {962, 19914}, {1484, 3627}, {3830, 10707}, {5691, 12737}, {6033, 10769}, {6321, 10768}, {7728, 10778}, {8148, 12531}, {10739, 10772}, {10740, 10777}, {10741, 10770}, {10747, 10771}, {10750, 10782}, {10751, 10781}, {10755, 18440}, {10773, 15521}, {10774, 15522}, {10780, 12918}, {13268, 18507}<br>
X(22938) = reflection of X(i) in X(j) for these (i,j): (119, 546), (214, 9955), (550, 6713), (1145, 18357), (1385, 16174), (3579, 6702), (12611, 18483)<br>
X(22938) = {X(i),X(j)}-harmonic conjugate of X(k) for these (i,j,k): (4, 149, 10742), (1478, 13274, 12735), (1479, 13273, 1387), (3830, 12773, 10728), (10707, 10728, 12773), (10738, 10742, 149)<br>
</p>
